reviews.review_msg: Amie is a very sweet person but I would not pick her as a teacher again.  She gave little guidance for tests and her classes would almost put me to sleep. Maybe it was because I took it at 4 pm and that's when my energy level goes down but her tone is just very steady and I wanted to kill myself. She is a fair marker though!

Her notes from her power points were hard to follow, because they didn't have a lot on them, they were basically just there for her to base her lecture off of. She also didn't give a lot of information about exams, so we basically just had to study every chapter we'd covered in the textbook, and all the notes we'd taken.
The final and midterm were not very hard as long as you`re good at memorizing everything that you learned! The test review is useless and she is not helpful.
I actually remember what we learned in class. Interesting classes and especially, the discussions are engaging. I have a feeling he reads ratemyprof (with all the memes he show in class)

I had him at the UofA and he is one of the best lecturers I've ever had. Show up to class cuz even tho he posts his slides, he elaborates and explains info orally that is tested on but is not otherwise available. He doesn't like email and he's a little hard to get ahold of outside of class but either that, You couldn't pick a better prof.
